archimate:Requirement.name: 4.4.4 SOC cyber security Incident control
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Each SOC should support response to cyber security incidents, which may include: 路~~~~~~~~ mobilising a full incident response team, either by convening an ad hoc team or notifying the permanent, full-time Computer Security Incident Response Team (CSIRT), supported by relevant subject-matter experts and business representatives 路~~~~~~~~ enabling close collaboration between many individuals and teams to contain and eradicate the threat 路~~~~~~~~ informing the crisis management team if the security incident is complex, high impact or long lasting 路~~~~~~~~ devising an action plan for handling the given incident and remediating the threat, often supported by recommendations from SOC analysts as to the appropriate response - performing follow-up activities, which may include conducting a root cause analysis to identify control weaknesses that need rectifying or other safeguards that can be implemented to prevent a recurrence.
